reviewText: This DVD is ONE of my FAVORITE! Really ! If you need a dance composition, a better understanding of movements of dance, THIS IS FOR YOU!

The Dance Composition DVD by Pastor Lynn Hayden is great video to have.  You will learn a variety of dance demonstration and movements working with a group or as an individuals.  You also learn Do's and Dont's which is important in dance presentations.
The Choreography Tips II/Dance Composition DVD is full of creative ideas for choreographing a dance.  Its very helpful whether used for learning or a teaching tool.

Dance Composition Tips and Techniques II is full of amazing tips and endless ideas for your dance choreographies.  What an excellent and at the same time hilarious DVD! You will enjoy every bit of this video. If you are a dancer and you want to improve in your dance choreography and develop new concepts of movements, please get this DVD. I guarantee you won't be disappointed!!
IT A BEATIFUL RESORSE. IF YOU NEED A FRESH LOOK AND NEW IDEAS FOR YOU CHOREOFRAPHY THIS IS YOU DVD.
